summary: Iteration 34 - Testing Voice Assistant Navigation, Drawing Chapters, AI BG Remove, Employee Login. All 15 backend tests passed. All frontend features verified working.
critical_code_review_comments: Voice Assistant NAVIGATION_COMMANDS dictionary correctly includes: admission, calendar, employees, timetable, exams
AI Background Remove endpoint (/api/school/ai-remove-background) exists and is accessible
Drawing chapters exist for Nursery_Drawing, LKG_Drawing, UKG_Drawing in boardSyllabus.js
School Management Receipt Settings page has 2 AI BG Remove buttons (Signature & Seal)
Employee creation with login and employee login both working correctly
seed_data_creation: Created test employees during testing (auto-generated unique emails)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Voice Assistant navigation commands for admission, calendar, employees, timetable, exams all return correct navigate_to URLs. 2) Drawing chapters exist for pre-primary classes. 3) AI BG Remove buttons present on Receipt Settings page. 4) Employee creation and login working.

details: POST /api/voice-assistant/chat with 'admission form open karo' returns navigate_to: /app/students
POST /api/voice-assistant/chat with 'calendar kholo' returns navigate_to: /app/school-calendar
POST /api/voice-assistant/chat with 'employees kholo' returns navigate_to: /app/employee-management
POST /api/voice-assistant/chat with 'timetable kholo' returns navigate_to: /app/timetable
POST /api/voice-assistant/chat with 'exam kholo' returns navigate_to: /app/online-exam
Nursery_Drawing chapters exist in PRE_PRIMARY_CHAPTERS (10 chapters)
LKG_Drawing chapters exist in PRE_PRIMARY_CHAPTERS (10 chapters)
UKG_Drawing chapters exist in PRE_PRIMARY_CHAPTERS (10 chapters)
All chapters have hasDrawing: true flag
POST /api/school/ai-remove-background endpoint exists
Endpoint requires authentication (director/principal only)
Accepts file upload with image_type parameter (signature/seal)
Receipt Settings page shows 2 AI BG Remove buttons
AI Seal generation button also present
GET /api/employees returns employee list
POST /api/employees creates employee with login credentials
Created employee can login immediately with POST /api/auth/login
Employee gets correct role (teacher) and permissions
Page loads at /app/school-management
Has 4 tabs: School Profile, Payment Settings, Academic Settings, Receipt Settings
Receipt Settings tab shows Signature & Seal section
AI BG Remove buttons visible for both Signature and Seal
Page loads at /app/school-calendar
Shows calendar grid with month/year view options
Event categories visible (National, Festival, State, Vacation, School, Exam)
